PyEmir Reference¶

Release:0.9
Date:Nov 23, 2017

Warning

This “Reference” is still a work in progress; some of the material is not organized, and several aspects of PyEmir are not yet covered sufficient detail.

  • emirdrp.recipes — Reduction Recipes for EMIR
    • Recipes for auxiliary modes
    • Recipes for image modes
    • Recipes for engineering
  • emirdrp.dataproducts — Data products of the EMIR pipeline
  • emirdrp.instrument —
  • emirdrp.simulation —
